channel.title: Sending ADSR and velocity out via midi
channel.description: Hey team, I currently use the midi/out/note, to send midi out of my axo to external synth. Is there a more complex midi out object where I can modify attack, release, velocity etc?

item.title: Sending ADSR and velocity out via midi
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

You mean you want to edit he destination synths parameters, like attack, decay and so on from Axoloti?

If so, you can use one of the midi/out/cc objects to change the destination synths cc values.

Read full topic
item.source: Sending ADSR and velocity out via midi
